Banner.Description: I have 3 years of experience developing systems, interfaces and technological solutions to make the web a better place. I am dedicated to writing and refactoring clean, reusable, and scalable code in Angular applying good practices and development standards.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In my 3 years as a developer, I seek to train every day. I have worked writing unit tests, performing continuous integration, and covering backend developer roles with PHP and Mysql. I have led teams having empathy, exercising motivation to partners, and setting plans and goals together.
My skills also include implementing system improvements, optimizing sites, standardizing patterns, and suggesting and executing ideas that add value to the project I'm working on.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Software developer
Description: I started my study with a basic knowledge of coding and scripting.
Now almost 3 years in i worked my way up to become the developer i am today.

Experience.Jobs.Title: DuZ & Co
Description: Duz & Co is a webbased software development company.
Their goal is to build a sustainable management system for businesses to use.
They primarily work with PHP, Jquery, javascript, HTML and css.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message.
